item.name: Get Event by correlation id and event id

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Authorization header generated by Postman.

body.raw:
{
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.management.endpoints.web.exposure.include": "prometheus,info,health",
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.management.metrics.export.prometheus.enabled": true,
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.scriptable-transformer.language": "groovy",
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.scriptable-transformer.script": "import groovy.json.JsonSlurper\\nimport groovy.json.JsonOutput\\nimport io.grnry.scdfapps.scriptable.snowplow.SnowplowSerDe\\nimport java.util.logging.Logger\\nimport io.grnry.scdfapps.scriptable.snowplow.SnowplowCollectorPayload\\n\\nLogger logger = Logger.getLogger(\\\"groovy-transform\\\")\\n\\nSnowplowCollectorPayload snowplowEvent = SnowplowSerDe.deserialize(payload)\\nlogger.info(\\\"payload: \\\" + snowplowEvent)\\nJsonSlurper jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()\\n\\nif (snowplowEvent.getBody()){\\n    logger.info(\\\"body: \\\" + snowplowEvent.getBody())\\n    try{\\n        def actualPayload =  jsonSlurper.parseText(snowplowEvent.getBody())\\n        if (actualPayload?.data[0]) {        \\n            def data = actualPayload.data[0]\\n            if (data.\\\"$path\\\") {\\n                logger.info(\\\"value: \\\" + (String) data.\\\"$path\\\")\\n                return JsonOutput.toJson(snowplowEvent)\\n            }\\n        }\\n    }\\n\\n    catch (Exception e){\\n        e.printStackTrace()\\n        return null\\n    }\\n}\\nreturn null",
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.scriptable-transformer.variables": "path=duid",
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.spring.cloud.stream.bindings.input.consumer.concurrency": 3,
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.spring.cloud.stream.bindings.input.consumer.partitioned": true,
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.spring.cloud.stream.bindings.output.consumer.partitioned": true,
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.spring.cloud.stream.bindings.output.producer.partitionCount": 24,
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.spring.cloud.stream.kafka.bindings.input.consumer.resetOffsets": true,
    "app.grnry-scriptable-processor.spring.cloud.stream.kafka.bindings.input.consumer.startOffset": "earliest",
	"app.grnry-data-in-metadata-processor.metadata.correlationIdExpression": "#safeJsonPath(#safeJsonPath(payload, 'body'), 'data[0].duid')?:'NO_CORRELATION_ID'",
    "app.grnry-data-in-metadata-processor.metadata.eventIdExpression": "#randomUUID()",
    "app.grnry-data-in-metadata-processor.metadata.eventTypeName": "sp_js",
    "app.grnry-data-in-metadata-processor.metadata.harvesterName": "tme_harvester_sp_js",
    "app.grnry-data-in-metadata-processor.spring.cloud.stream.bindings.input.consumer.concurrency": 3,
    "app.grnry-data-in-metadata-processor.spring.cloud.stream.bindings.input.consumer.partitioned": true,
    "app.grnry-data-in-metadata-processor.spring.cloud.stream.bindings.output.producer.partitionCount": 24,
    "app.grnry-data-in-metadata-processor.spring.cloud.stream.bindings.output.producer.partitionKeyExpression": "headers['grnry-correlation-id']",
    "deployer.*.kubernetes.imagePullPolicy": "Always",
    "deployer.*.kubernetes.limits.cpu": "400m",
    "deployer.*.kubernetes.limits.memory": "512Mi",
    "deployer.*.kubernetes.requests.cpu": "400m",
    "deployer.*.kubernetes.requests.memory": "512Mi",
    "deployer.*.kubernetes.livenessProbeDelay":"120",
    "deployer.*.kubernetes.readinessProbeDelay":"120", 
    "deployer.*.kubernetes.volumeMounts": "[{name: 'secret', mountPath: '/usr/src/app/rsa_privatekey.key' , subPath: 'rsa_privatekey.key' , readOnly : 'true' },{name: 'secret', mountPath: '/usr/src/app/rsa_publickey.key' , subPath: 'rsa_publickey.key' , readOnly : 'true' }]",
    "deployer.*.kubernetes.volumes": "[{name: 'secret', secret: { secretName : 'grnry-base-encryption-token' , defaultMode : '256' }}]"
}

{
    "name": "{{$randomInt}}-test-belt",
    "description": "Test Belt to append to profile.",
    "labels": [],
    "affectedPaths": [],
    "replicas": 1,
    "millicpu": 200,
    "memory": 512,
    "author": "",
    "reader": [
        ""_auth""
    ],
    "editor": [
        "{{belt_edit_perm}}"
    ],
    "viewer": [
        "{{belt_view_perm}}"
    ],
    "created": 1562595981223,
    "assumedRole": "",
    "requirementsPy": "",
    "extractorVersion": "",
    "extractorFn": "import json
import sys
from time import time
from grnry.beltextractor.update import Update
import logging
import random

def lookup(dictionary,keys):
   
	if type(dictionary)==type(''):
			
		dictionary=json.loads(dictionary)
	try:
		if len(keys)>1:
			value = lookup(dictionary[keys[0]],keys[1:])
		
		else:
			value = dictionary[keys[0]]
		
		return value
	
	except:
		
		return None

def myfunc(input,profile_data,config):
	return str(random.randint(1,6))
	
def makepath(stringpath):
	path=stringpath.split('/')
	return path  
			
def execute(event_headers, event, profile=None):
	encoding = 'UTF-8'

	logging.basicConfig(format='%(asctime)s [%(levelname)s] %(name)s: %(message)s')
	logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

	logger.setLevel(logging.DEBUG)
	logger.debug("event: " + str(event))
	logger.debug("profile: " + str(profile))
	
	
	correlation_id= event_headers['grnry-correlation-id']
	event_data = lookup(event,['body'])
	
	if event_data is None:
		return None
	

	logger.debug("event data is: " + str(event_data))
	updates=[]
	
	if lookup(event_data,["crash"])=="1":
		logger.debug("crash")
		crash #crash is not defined
	
	if lookup(event_data,['simple_pairs']):
		
		for simple_pair in lookup(event_data,['simple_pairs']): 
			value = simple_pair['value']
			if lookup(simple_pair,['operation']):
				if simple_pair['operation'] in ['_array_append', '_array_put', '_array_append_with_history', '_array_put_with_history'] and not type(value) == type([]):
					value = [value]
				updates.append(Update(simple_pair['cid'],makepath(simple_pair['path'])).set_value(value=value, reader=simple_pair['reader'], origin=simple_pair['origin'])) 
				updates[-1].set_operation(simple_pair['operation'])
			else:
				updates.append(Update(simple_pair['cid'],makepath(simple_pair['path'])).set_value(value=value, reader=simple_pair['reader'], origin=simple_pair['origin'])) 

			if lookup(simple_pair,['type']):
				updates[-1].set_type(simple_pair['type'])
	
	if lookup(event_data,['process']) and profile:
		for event in lookup(event_data,['process']):
			profile_path='jsonPayload'+'/'+event['profile_path']+'/'+'_latest'+'/'+'_v'
			processed_data=myfunc(event['value'],lookup(profile,makepath(profile_path)),event['config'])
			updates.append(Update(event['cid'],makepath(event['path'])).set_value(value=processed_data, reader=event['reader']))
	
	if len(updates)>0:
		return updates
	else:
		return None  
",
    "eventTypes": [
        "snowplow-b"
    ],
    "partitionOffsets": {},
    "beltType": "",
    "runtime": "",
    "parameter": "",
    "debug": false,
    "fetchProfile": "false",
    "profileType": "{{profile_type}}",
    "secret": "belt-api-tester",
    "secretUsername": "username",
    "secretPassword": "password",
    "volumes": null,
    "volumeMounts": null,
    "extraEnv": null
}
